scripts.debug: set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./server/config&& set NODE_ENV=development&& set LOG_LEVEL=debug&& nodemon ./server/server.js
scripts.debugPRD: set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./server/config&& set NODE_ENV=production&& set LOG_LEVEL=debug&& node ./server/server.js
scripts.serverTests: set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./server/config&& set NODE_ENV=development&& set JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=server/test-result/result.xml&& set JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1&& mocha ./server/test --timeout 25000 --colors --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter || true
scripts.startBaseline: set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./server/config&& set NODE_ENV=baseline&& set LOG_LEVEL=debug&& nodemon ./server/server.js
scripts.startDEV: set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./server/config&& set NODE_ENV=development&& set LOG_LEVEL=info&& nodemon ./server/server.js
scripts.startINT: set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./server/config&& set NODE_ENV=integration&& set LOG_LEVEL=info&& node ./server/server.js
scripts.startPRD: set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./server/config&& set NODE_ENV=production&& set LOG_LEVEL=info&& nodemon ./server/server.js
scripts.testBaseline: set NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./server/config&& set NODE_ENV=baseline&& set JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=server/test-result/result.xml&& set JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1&& mocha ./server/test --timeout 25000 --colors --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter || true
